text: Cries and Whispers () is a 1972 Swedish period drama movie directed by Ingmar Bergman and stars Harriet Andersson, Liv Ullmann, Kari Sylwan, Ingrid Thulin. It was nominated for 5 Oscars and won for Best Cinematography in 1974. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1972 drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Swedish-language movies Category:Movies directed by Ingmar Bergman Category:Movies about sisters Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies set in Sweden Category:Movies set in the 1890s
title: Cries and Whispers
